# summary()

**Instance Method**

Generates a categorical summary of the column slice’s elements.

## Declaration

```swift
func summary() -> CategoricalSummary<WrappedElement>
```

## Summarizing a Column Slice

- **numericSummary()**: Generates a numeric summary of the integer column slice’s elements.
- **numericSummary()**: Generates a numeric summary of the floating-point column slice’s elements.

items.description: Generates a numeric summary of the integer column slice’s elements.
items.name: numericSummary()

items.description: Generates a numeric summary of the floating-point column slice’s elements.
items.name: numericSummary()
